extendedInfo.description: I represent to you icon pack for ADW Launcher EX.Icons are executed in glass style which will perfectly look with your favourite program.350 icons of excellent quality and it only the beginning are added!How to apply icons:1. Long press an apps icon2. Select edit from selection bar3. Press the icon picture in upper left corner4. Press ADWTheme IconPacks5. Press ADW Icon App 3To use the icon with Desktop Visualizer:1. Press select icon2. Press Image File3. Press ADW Icon App 34. Scroll and select your iconKeywords: custom dock dock pack adw theme launcherpro icon dockbar docks ADW Launcher ex pack icon pack Desktop Visualizer ADW Launcher

reviews.title: Needs to be improved.
reviews.comment: Some of the icon images tend to be a little small to appreciate as a consequence of being wrapped in the rectangular glass overlay, the overlay also tends to reduce the clarity of the upper region on some of the icon images - a little less top lighting on the overlay would do the pack a little justice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good stuff
reviews.comment: Great theme and icon pack, with an awesome developer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add more
reviews.comment: Will increase rating when more icons are added
reviews.author: eric rust

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: please update and add more icon.
